message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both need to reach an agreement, and you'll get your money immediately without any inflation impact.
Let's be more reasonable, a 55-45 split is more fair considering we're just starting out and have plenty of time to negotiate.

Bob, let's meet in the middle. A 55-45 split in my favor is fair considering I'm affected by inflation while you're not. Each round costs me 20% of value, so we should reach an agreement soon to maximize value for both of us.
Considering the inflation impact on your side, I'm being generous with a 60-40 split in my favor. It's in your best interest to accept this offer as the value for you will continue to decrease.
